availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Catherine Wall Searcy in Fayette County, Kentucky, on November 13, 1855. Father of J. W. Searcy and James D. Searcy. Carpenter in Lexington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette county, Ward 1, Lexington, p. 102.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994033, Fayette County Marriages, p. unknown.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7016180, Fayette County Deaths, file #29825.
